page.title: 02BOURNE END COMMUNITY CENTRE
page.content: A group of Bourne End citizens thought that a community the size of ours should have a community centre.It took 4 years to raise the money for the centre.In 1967 it was officially opened by Lord Lieutenant,County of Buckingham .It was built to provide a place to bring people together,also to discuss the community's welfare.The centre is used for 81 different activities, including amateur dramatics and horticulture.The Bar area is used for any committee meetings.A Creche,also held in the bar,needs better facilities .The centre is troubled by vandals to a certain extent,but not seriously. The Community Centre warden organizes an annual carnival week of multi-activ ities with a procession,sideshows and fete.
